examples: That guy is nerdy and weird.

definitions.definition: Of, pertaining to, in the style of, or appealing to nerds.
examples: I got a pair of nerdy glasses and clothes for Halloween.
definitions.label_groups: colloquial , derogatory , of a quality or interest

main_definition: ( colloquial , derogatory , of a person ) Being or like a nerd .
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial , derogatory , of a quality or interest ) Of, pertaining to, in the style of, or appealing to nerds.
